sentences.en: " I'm out here on assignment for National Geographic, " he said. " You familiar with the magazine? "
sentences.cn: 他说: “ 我是《地理杂志 》 派到这里来的,您熟悉这个杂志 吗 ? ”

sentences.en: A road map is a visualization of geographic information.
sentences.cn: 道路图是可视化的地理信息.

sentences.en: Across geographic gradients, Levins expects allopatric races or coenospecies exist.
sentences.cn: 穿过地理梯度, 莱文斯预料有分布区不重叠的小种或近群种.

sentences.en: Discontinuous geographic variation is often set aside as a special case.
sentences.cn: 不连续地理变异,人们往往作为一种特殊情况把它分开.

sentences.en: Do you prefer to work in any specific geographic location?
sentences.cn: 你是不是想在某一特定的地方工作?

sentences.en: Each point on Earth is specified by geographic latitude and longitude.
sentences.cn: 地球上每一点都可以用地理纬度和经度来确定.

sentences.en: Environmental problems pay no heed to these geographic lines.
sentences.cn: 环境问题并不理会这些地理界限.

sentences.en: Geographic distance provided the mechanism for resolving the dispute.
sentences.cn: 地理上的距离提供了解决争议的途径.

sentences.en: Geographic isolation forces all animals to evolve on their own separate paths.
sentences.cn: 地理隔离促使动物们向着不同的方向进化.

sentences.en: In the western provinces there are different geographic formations.
sentences.cn: 在西部各省有不同的地理结构.

sentences.en: That brings up significant issues as authoritative source vs . volunteered geographic information.
sentences.cn: 那带来了重要问题,比如:官方数据vs自愿提供的数据.

sentences.en: The city's success owes much to its geographic position.
sentences.cn: 这座城市的成功很大程度上归功于它的地理位置.

sentences.en: The geographic distribution of lung cancer was dissimilar to that of industrialization.
sentences.cn: 肺癌的地理分布同工业化的分布不尽相同.

sentences.en: These geographic imagination and imaginary geography are important contents of this dissertation.
sentences.cn: 这些想象的地理与地理的想象空间是本研究的重要内容.

sentences.en: User community and geographic distribution of users.
sentences.cn: 用户社区和用户的地理分布。

sentences.en: Your idea of combining dialect with geographic analysis is unique.
sentences.cn: 结合方言的地理分析也很独到.
